property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: The location that houses the boards played in ''The Legend of Tenna''.

property.name: page
property.value: The Legend of Tenna

property.name: description
property.value: A hallway containing doors that unlock after receiving at least a certain rank on the previous round of [[TV Time]]. Extra pathways unlock if Z-Rank or T-Rank was attained.

property.name: page
property.value: Green Room#ABC-Rank Rewards Room

property.name: description
property.value: A hallway unlocked after receiving a T-Rank on the previous round of [[TV Time]]. Contains a book at the end of the hallway.

property.name: page
property.value: Green Room#T-Rank Room

property.name: description
property.value: A changing room that [[Kris]] enters alone, only accessible after receiving a Z-Rank on any round of [[TV Time]]. Contains a manhole that leads to the [[Backstage]] area of the Green Room, allowing Kris to start or continue the [[Sword Route]].

property.name: page
property.value: Green Room#Z-Rank Changing Room

property.name: description
property.value: A changing room that [[Kris]] enters alone, only accessible after receiving at least an S-Rank on any round of [[TV Time]]. Has a door leading to the [[Backstage]] area of the Green Room, allowing Kris to start or continue the [[Sword Route]].

property.name: page
property.value: Green Room#S-Rank Changing Room

property.name: description
property.value: Doorway to the Cold Place, a cold area at the edge of the TV World.

property.name: page
property.value: Cold Place

property.name: description
property.value: In between [[TV Time]] rounds, the [[party]] meet here to discuss what to do next. In between rounds 1 and 2, [[Susie]] goes into the TV Time room alone to speak with [[Tenna]]. In between rounds 2 and 3, Susie grows suspicious of Tenna's actions.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Tenna]] holds phone calls in between rounds before hastily hanging up whenever the [[party]] approaches. This eventually causes [[Susie]] to grow suspicious of Tenna's true motivations.

property.name: description
property.value: Inputting "[[1225]]" into the [[Ball Machine]] transports [[Kris]] to gacharoom_unknown, which is a large, open room that poses as a maze. Interacting with the blue Ball Machine within the room transports Kris back to the B-Rank room, and for the large Ball Machine to permanently disappear.

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] can replay the Rock Video minigame through this door after unlocking it.

property.name: page
property.value: Rock Video

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] can replay the Cooking Challenge minigame through this door.

property.name: page
property.value: Cooking Challenge

property.name: description
property.value: The [[party]] can play the Monster Movie minigame through this door after unlocking it.

property.name: page
property.value: Monster Movie

property.name: description
property.value: An alternate route that must be initiated in between rounds 1 and 2 of [[TV Time]]. Completion of the route grants the [[Shadow Mantle]].

property.name: page
property.value: Sword Route

property.name: description
property.value: Is friends with the [[Pippins]] next to it. Turns to stone after traversing the greater TV World.

property.name: description
property.value: Is friends with the [[Zapper]] next to it. After traversing the greater TV World, it laments that the Zapper turned to stone and urges the [[party]] to seal the [[Dark Fountain]].

property.name: description
property.value: Blocks the way to the [[Cold Place]] under [[Tenna]]'s orders. After round 2 of [[TV Time]], the [[party]] can provoke him into attacking by selecting "Do nothing" when talked to. If "Push his buttons" is selected twice, he allows the party through without conflict.

property.name: description
property.value: Gives the [[party]] an [[item]] depending on how they performed during each round of [[TV Time]].

property.name: description
property.value: Explains to [[Kris]] that they and [[Asriel]] took them home from [[School]] and how the [[Rudinn]]s they also took with them got lost.

property.name: description
property.value: Explains the rewards for attaining each rank and which doors are available to the party. If Z-Rank is attained, the Zapper explains that they have unlocked none of the rooms and reveals a hallway to the east that leads to the Z-Rank changing room. After traversing the greater TV World, the Zapper is replaced with a [[Vending Machine]] which trades [[POINT]]s for [[Dark Dollar]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: Is drinking water from the nearby [[Watercooler]]. If spoken to after defeating it, he mentions drinking water from an oasis eight times, which is a hint on a way to drain the oasis on the [[Desert Board]].

property.name: description
property.value: Is drinking water from the nearby [[Watercooler]]. If spoken to after defeating it, he remarks on how wars will be fought over the absence of water.

property.name: description
property.value: Explains how [[Susie]]'s Rude Buster deals more damage by timing [CONFIRM] to the hit.

property.name: description
property.value: A [[Shadowguy]] behind the curtain, changing his socks. When revealed, he screams, and the curtain is pulled back.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen doing his makeup in preparation for round 2 of [[TV Time]].

property.name: description
property.value: Explains that it got stuck to [[Kris]]'s clothes and expects to return to [[Castle]] town soon.

property.name: description
property.value: An unseen NPC behind the curtain. Gives [[Kris]] a [[Saber10]] after the first round of [[TV Time]].

property.name: description
property.value: Explains that the boards [[Kris]] has been playing had been modified by [[Tenna]] for his own purposes. After each board, he allows Kris to play the "original" versions of those boards.

property.name: description
property.value: Static encounter agaist a [[Watercooler]]. Awards 200 [[POINT]]s upon defeat.

property.name: description
property.value: A [[Pippins]] appears here if the [[party]] achieved a rank lower than S on the previous round of [[TV Time]]. They offer to sell an S-Rank bypass for 1500 [[POINT]]s

property.name: description
property.value: Offers [[weapons]] to the [[party]] to buy for [[POINT]]s.

property.name: page
property.value: Vending Machine

property.name: description
property.value: Offers [[armor]] and other [[items]] to the [[party]] to buy for [[POINT]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: Allows the [[party]] to sell their [[items]] for [[Dark Dollar]]s.

property.name: page
property.value: Vending Machine

property.name: description
property.value: Interacting with the [[Vending Machine]] allows the [[party]] to insert [[POINT]]s into the Ball Machine for a chance to win certain prizes.

property.name: page
property.value: Ball Machine

property.name: description
property.value: A [[Pippins]] blocks the doorway and offers to unlock the door in exchange for 500 [[POINT]]s.

property.name: description
property.value: Offers to exchange [[Dark Dollar]]s for [[POINT]]s as well as some [[TV Slop]] to buy for POINTs

property.name: page
property.value: Vending Machine

property.name: description
property.value: Warp Door in the Green Room. Can transport the [[party]] to previous areas of the TV World.

property.name: page
property.value: Warp Door

property.name: description
property.value: After attaining a T-Rank on any round of [[TV Time]], the [[party]] can read a page from this book.

properties.property:
Welcome to [[Ball Machine|BALL MACHINE]]. Insert [[POINT|points]] to gain PRIZES. The minimum is 100 POINTs. MORE POINTs increases GOLD CHANCE. Even if you miss GOLD PRIZE, nextime GOLD CHANCE increases faster! HIT the GOLD PRIZE, GOLD CHANCE will reset... etc. You turned to the camera and thanked [[Tenna]] tor a great toy! Thanks, Tenna!
... is, all part of what it said on the sign.

'''After board 1:''' (ACT 1 SCHEDULE)." (Various names and times are written on it.) ("ACT 2 SCHEDULE" is scrawled underneath in red pen...)
'''After board 2:''' It's the back of a paper. "ACT 3" is scrawled in red at the top.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Kris]] picks up the Odd Controller from the ground after attempting to start the [[Sword Route]] game for the first time.

property.name: page
property.value: Odd Controller

property.name: description
property.value: An unseen NPC stands here after round 1 of [[TV Time]]. After round 2, the NPC is replaced with a [[Shuttah]], and after traversing the greater TV World, the NPC disappears.

properties.property:
'''Initial:''' Stars ripple on the walls like soft music. You're filled with the power of relaxation.
'''Post-TV World:''' After a performance, when all the actors have gone home... You feel a sense of emptiness.
